title: Laws on Lawfare (with Mayor Jamie Driscoll)
itunes:title: Laws on Lawfare (with Mayor Jamie Driscoll)
description:
Jamie Driscoll, Labour Mayor of North of Tyne says the U.K. government needs to take strong action in next week's Spring Statement - the cost of living crisis is already causing real problems. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker we can't afford not to address the problem. Plus: journalist Tom Burgis says the Government is on the right track with legal reforms. But the author of 'Kleptopia: How Dirty Money is Conquering the World' says it needs to address 'lawfare' by deep-pocketed complainants using the legal system to silence critics.
